title: BitcoinVN_News
author: BitcoinVN_News
content: Conference Link: https://indonesiabitcoinconference.com/Speakers include Jack Dorsey, Samson Mow, Obi Nwosu (Fedi), Alex Gladstein, Stephan Livera and many of the regional ASEAN heavy hittersQuoteThe regional Bitcoin communities started interconnecting with various Bitcoin-only conferences hosted across the region – by the Vietnamese in Da Nang, the Filipinos in Boracay and the Thai in their capital city of Bangkok.The final headline event of the year is going to be put on by the.Indonesian Bitcoin Community – inviting Bitcoiners from South East Asia.and beyond to join in on the island of Bali for a blazing jamboree to conclude jubilantly.the wild Bitcoin event ride across the region in 2023.BitcoinVN community sponsorship: Bitcoin Indonesia Conference

comments.author: BitcoinVN_News
comments.body: Three weeks to go  Ahead of the Bali conference we had the chance to catch up with organizer Dea Rezkitha, giving us the rundown on:- How the Bitcoin scene in Bali has been evolved over the years- For what type of Bitcoiners Bali might be also be a part- or long-term option- ...and of course a sneak peak into some of the expected highlights at the event itself  Full interview: https://bitcoinvn.io/news/bitcoin-conference-bali-interview-dea-rezkitha/

comments.author: BitcoinVN_News
comments.body: The final conference agenda has been released  --> https://indonesiabitcoinconference.com/agendas/

comments.author: BitcoinVN_News
comments.body: ...and some follow-up impressions from the event in Bali:https://bitcoinvn.io/news/bitcoin-in-bali-in-2023-attendee-voices/

comments.author: CRAIC
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinVN_News on October 04, 2023, 08:51:24 AMSpeakers include Jack Dorsey, Samson Mow, Obi Nwosu (Fedi), Alex Gladstein, Stephan Livera and many of the regional ASEAN heavy hittersI know Jack Dorsey. Very interesting guy. It's a pity that I won't have time to buy tickets
